name: Venture Farm
overview:
We are an equity funding source that adds hands-on experience to the execution process without taking majority equity position.

We help portfolio companies focus on execution vs. experimentation effective use of capital, build effective teams, and train entrepreneurs in good management.

We help portfolio companies on two important fronts: 1. Management: Organization, Financial Controls, Sales & Marketing, etc. 2. Domain Specific advice; Value Verification, Contacts, etc.

We guide portfolio companies towards rapid graduation from Venture Farm and full independence.

We are:

  • NOT an incubator
  • NOT a venture capital firm
  • NOT a consulting firm
  • NOT in business of introductions
  • NOT a replacement for management
  • NOT in real estate business

Venture Farm follows a collaborative model that not only co-exists with other funding and venture organizations, but also aims to increase the value delivered to each ecosystem partner â€“ including the entire chain of investors and the entrepreneurs.

The Managing Partner, Sid Mohasseb (www.mohasseb.com) Blog address (http://sidmohasseb.blogspot.com/), the Limited Partners and the Advisory team offer extensive investment, consulting / coaching experience, as well as, C-level operational and execution skills that are critical to building successful teams, executable and effective strategies and scalable organizations.
